special_abilities.name: Iron Boots.
descriptions: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

special_abilities.name: Outsize Strength.
descriptions: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

actions.name: Wicked Sickle.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Ironbound Pursuit.
descriptions: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10+4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
